titlestmt.title: Description of Center for Advanced Judaic Studies Library, Halper 352: Court document

publicationstmt.publisher: Center for Advanced Judaic Studies Library

notesstmt.note: The upper-left corner of a document. The first two digits of the date and the members of the court are missing. Many laudatory terms, in Hebrew, appear in the first lines, including an unusual one, צינצנת המן. The rest of the content is in legal Aramaic; The names Abu'l-Rabi'a and Abi'l-Fakhar appear.
Condition: fragment, damaged, triangular in shape; losses, faded; verso is blank.

msidentifier.repository: Center for Advanced Judaic Studies Library

mscontents.textlang: Official Aramaic (700-300 BCE); Imperial Aramaic (700-300 BCE); Judeo-Arabic; Hebrew

layoutdesc.layout: Lines: 16 partially extant (recto); ruling method: left rule justified by stretching last character.

history.provenance: Cairo Genizah Collection (University of Pennsylvania. Center for Advanced Judaic Studies. Library).
